states: no, at most reaching metasomal segment 2
characters.name: Are the wings fully developed?

states: absent, not even visible as a spectral vein
characters.name: Is forewing vein 2m-cu present?
Does the forewing have vein (Rs+M)a separating the 1st discal and the 1st submarginal cells?

states: no, vein 1r-m is opposite or apical to the separation of R1 and Rs
characters.name: Is the hind wing vein 1r-m basal to the separation of veins R1 and Rs?

states: no, strongly sclerotized and fused together
characters.name: Are the metasomal sterna weakly sclerotized, and collapsed when dried?
Was the specimen found in Chile?
Is the venation well developed in the hind wing (veins R, base of Rs, 1r-m, and M clearly visible and one or more cells closed by tubular veins)?

states: no, metasomal tergum 2 clearly separated and articulated with tergum 3
characters.name: Is metasomal tergum 2 fused with 3 (apparent tergum 2 with 2 spiracles on each side)?

states: no, tips of mandibles are touching when closed, or overlapping
characters.name: Are the mandibles widely separated when closed, with tips not touching?
Are the mandibular teeth pointed outward (exodont)?
Is the apical (ventral) margin of the clypeus concave?
Is the labrum exposed, between the clypeus and mandibles when the mandibles are closed?
Is the anterior surface of the labrum concave or flat?

taxa.name: (a few genera of Aphidiinae and Doryctinae) Braconidae
[Ypsistocerini (Rogadinae), some Hormiini (Rogadinae) and some Doryctinae] Braconidae
